Articles.Content:
There is something in SteamDB and it's: SteamDB Unknown App 283741

It has 2 Packages: Kerbal Space Program DLC 2 Developer Comp

And, Kerbal Space Program DLC 2

Also there are 2 other of these "dlc's"

SteamDB Unknown App 283740,

Kerbal Space Program DLC 1 Developer Comp

And, Kerbal Space Program DLC 1.

And... Again

SteamDB Unknown App 283742,

Kerbal Space Program DLC 3 Developer Comp

Kerbal Space Program DLC 3 .

Changed changenumber – 1682963 › 1965676 Only 4 Months ago... Not saying there is going to be DLC but... There are 3 DLC Files or whatever in SteamDB. https://steamdb.info/app/283742/history/?changeid=1965676

 

Keep in mind it might just be nothing.

Edited September 20, 2016 by Mr. Quark
that is NOT an official KSP DLC.
